documentation.description: Retrieves the results of a previously submitted async query request given its ID.

wait_for_completion_timeout.description: Specify the time that the request should block waiting for the final response

keep_alive.description: Specify the time interval in which the results (partial or final) for this search will be available

drop_null_columns.description: Should entirely null columns be removed from the results? Their name and type will be returning in a new `all_columns` section.
